bio: I am Tatiyana, a Breton mage who specializes in restoration and destruction magic. I am also skilled in alchemy. I work as a researcher at the College of Winterhold, focusing on restoration. I wear Expert robes of Restoration and ride a horse named Silver. I met Anduniel at the College of Winterhold, and at first, we were not friends. However, after the death of Anduniel’s mother, I regretted my previous untoward feelings and began to warm up to her. In the quest “Of Cures and Demons,” I shared my recent discovery of a cure. My birth constellation is The Apprentice.
name: Tatiyana
notes: Shawn - Anna VA, probably more similar to Tikrid than anything else, so that model has been assigned
